title: Little Red and the Big Bad Wolf: A BBW Paranormal Erotic Fairy Tale
description: Scarlett's little town is being stalked by a beast. It only preys on young beautiful virgins, so she thinks her curvy body is off the menu. But when she volunteers to sacrifice herself for the sake of her town, she didn't know exactly what she signed up for. This is no ordinary wolf. Werewolf Rafe has found his mate, and he has to take her body or lose control.
author: Ellen Dominick
